alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Douglas; Lac Qui Parle; Pope; Stevens; Swift; Todd (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 3:28AM CST until December 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central and west central Minnesota. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will plummet tonight from the 40s to the teens. Heavy rain and thunderstorms will turn to a wintry mix of snow and freezing drizzle. A flash freeze will result.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
